title: The Makeover
description: Slightly panicked about her impending thirtieth birthday, Allie decides a makeover is called for. The handsome boss she has a slight crush on suddenly starts to pay attention to her new look and the flirting between them brings her mind to a fantasy of office romance or rather office sex. When the boss asks her to stay late one night she suspects that he has more than work on his mind. She takes the opportunity to tease him by flashing her stockings and it ends up with an erotic encounter in his office.
author: Allie Wilder
